attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make cyclists come under the same laws as car/motorcycle drivers. i.e. a mandatory licence (free or paid for), with penalty points/fines for the same offences as car/motorbike drivers i.e. cycling without lights/fluorescent markings, wrong way on one way streets, pavements, speed limits, possibly number plates, TP insurance etc.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
